QueueInterface¶

class convtrack.queueinterface.QueueInterface[source]¶

Bases: object

Methods Summary

qstat()

Calls the system’s qstat and parses its results.

qsub(path_to_file)

Calls the system’s qsub method, and returns a job ID for tracking purposes.

write_submission_script(path, jobname, …)

Writes a submission script to a specified path.

Methods Documentation

static qstat() → List[Dict][source]¶

Calls the system’s qstat and parses its results. :return: A list of dictionaries, each containing job information.

static qsub(path_to_file: str) → str[source]¶

Calls the system’s qsub method, and returns a job ID for tracking purposes. :param path_to_file: path to the file being called :type path_to_file: str :return: None

static write_submission_script(path: str, jobname: str, n_nodes: int, cores_per_node: int, walltime: str, quality_of_service: str, email: str = None) → None[source]¶

Writes a submission script to a specified path. Will raise a FileExistsError if a file already exists there. :param path: Path to the submission script. :type path: str :param jobname: Name of the job. :type jobname: str :param n_nodes: Number of nodes. :type n_nodes: int :param cores_per_node: Number of cores per node. :type cores_per_node: int :param walltime: Walltime, as a string, in a format acceptable for the PBS scheduler. :type walltime: str :param quality_of_service: Quality of service string, per the Exabyte documentation. Examples include “D”, “OR”, “OR4”, etc. :type quality_of_service: str :param email: Optional. Which email to contact when a job completes. :type email: str :return: None
